author: ndimiduk
msg: HBASE-9570 With AccessDeniedException, HBase shell would be better to just display the error message to be user friendly (Yang Wang)

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix the svn_client_get_merging_summary() function, which would crash or throw
an assertion failure if called with the target being a non-absolute WC path
and the revision kind being 'working' or 'unspecified'.  The current 'svn'
never calls it this way, but other clients could (and I tried writing some
indeed an abspath. Initialize the 'merge->target' output.
(svn_client_get_merging_summary): Convert the path-or-URL to an abspath
